text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://fhir.cqgc.ferlab.bio/CodeSystem/organization-type-plus defines the following code:

CodeDisplayDefinitionFrench (fr)
labdx Diagnostic LaboratoryLaboratory that processes the sample sent by medical serviceLaboratoire de diagnostic

name: organization-type-plus
title: Organization type-plus
description: The added values ​​(specific to our systems) which extend the CodeSystem provided by HL7

concept.definition: Laboratory that processes the sample sent by medical service
